hero.title: Find Balance in Mind, Body & Spirit
hero.description: Experience holistic wellness through personalized programs designed to nurture your complete wellbeing. Start your journey to a healthier, more balanced life today.

features.title: Why Choose Etiqa Wellness Wellness
features.description: We combine ancient wisdom with modern science to create transformative wellness experiences.

holistic.title: Holistic Approach
holistic.description: Comprehensive wellness programs that address mind, body, and spirit for complete transformation.

personalized.title: Personalized Plans
personalized.description: Customized wellness journeys tailored to your unique needs, goals, and lifestyle.

expert.title: Expert Guidance
expert.description: Work with certified wellness coaches and practitioners dedicated to your success.

natural.title: Natural Methods
natural.description: Evidence-based practices rooted in nature and ancient wisdom for sustainable results.

services.title: Our Wellness Programs
services.description: Carefully crafted programs designed to support your journey to optimal health and wellbeing.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness & Meditation
mindfulness.description: Learn powerful techniques to reduce stress, increase focus, and cultivate inner peace through guided meditation practices.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Coaching
nutrition.description: Discover sustainable eating habits that nourish your body and support your wellness goals with personalized meal planning.

movement.title: Movement & Yoga
movement.description: Strengthen your body and calm your mind with gentle yoga flows and movement practices suitable for all levels.

testimonials.title: Transformative Stories
testimonials.description: Hear from our community members who have experienced profound changes in their lives.

emily.name: Emily Chen
emily.content: The mindfulness program completely transformed how I handle stress. I feel more centered and focused than ever before.

michael.name: Michael Rodriguez
michael.content: Working with Etiqa Wellness has been life-changing. The personalized approach made all the difference in achieving my wellness goals.

sarah.name: Sarah Thompson
sarah.content: I love the holistic approach. The combination of nutrition, movement, and mindfulness has improved every aspect of my life.

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Wellness Journey?
cta.description: Take the first step towards a healthier, more balanced life. Book your free consultation today and discover how we can support your transformation.
